flawed_nl_solution:
Connie spent 10 tickets on earbuds + 15 tickets on glow bracelets = <<10+15=27>>27 tickets.
Since Connie spends half of her tickets on a stuffed koala bear, that means the 27 tickets she spent on earbuds and glow bracelets is the other half, so she spent 27 tickets on the stuffed koala bear.
In all, Connie spent 27 tickets on earbuds and glow bracelets + 27 tickets on a stuffed koala bear = <<27+27=54>>54 tickets.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 25, not 27. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
